node.title: Mum threatened at knifepoint with children in car
node.alt: The front of a bronze coloured Range Rover crashed into a police car
node.description: Police allege the woman parked her Range Rover station wagon at her Klemzig home around 3:20pm yesterday and wasÂ approached by a man armed with a knife.
node.content:
["A mother who was in a car with her two young children has been threatened at knifepoint during a brazen daylight robbery in Adelaide's north.", "Police allege the woman parked her Range Rover station wagon at her Klemzig home around 3:20pm yesterday and was\u00a0approached by a man armed with a knife.", "He threatened the woman, who had her two young children in the car with her.", "He was accompanied by another man, who\u00a0stole\u00a0property from the woman's home\u00a0including a green Holden ute.", "The victim and her children got out of the car before\u00a0the suspect drove off in the station wagon, while the other suspect drove off in the ute.", "The woman and her children were not injured.", "
Four people arrested after police pursuit
", "Just before 5:00am\u00a0on Thursday, witnesses reported seeing the green ute being parked in Oratanga Road in Modbury North.", "Police\u00a0said the suspect covered the ute with a tarp before joining three other suspects in the stolen Range Rover, which was nearby.", "The station wagon drove off, but was spotted by nearby patrols on Montague Road heading east about 10 minutes later.", "It was pursued along other roads and road spikes were deployed but the station wagon managed to drive around them.", "The stolen vehicle collided with a patrol car near the intersection of Whites Road and Diment Road at Salisbury North.", "A police officer inside the car suffered minor injuries.", "The Range Rover was abandoned and all four occupants were arrested.", "Police said a 25-year-old woman from Elizabeth Vale, a 20-year-old man from Nuriootpa, a 15-year-old boy from Hope Valley and a 19-year-old man from Mansfield Park would face numerous charges including aggravated robbery, illegal use of a motor vehicle and theft.", "Police expect\u00a0they will be refused bail in the Elizabeth Magistrates Court later today."]
